title: MY ACCOUNT
body:
Hello... i would like to know how long i have played LOL. 
NOT how many hours i spent playing.
Can u Help? 
or maybe u could just tell me since when does my account created.
i want to know so badly :D
Thank you before :)

replies.body: Account creation date is a part of your personal account information, so that kind of data isn't something we can just give out. If you still have the original signup email, you could check the date on that to find out!
